app.title: IBITGO
title: iBitGo: Buy Bitcoin safely, easily and instantly
desc: Buy Bitcoin safely, easily and instantly at iBitGo
menu.buy.title: Buy {coin}
menu.sell.title: Sell {coin}
payment.bank-transfer.desc: Transfer money to the bank account info given to you, once the transfer is made then please, mark trade as paid to lock the escrow and wait for the seller to confirm. You MUST click "PAID" before the time expires or else the trade will expire. Once the seller of Bitcoins confirms receipt of your funds, they will release the Bitcoin from escrow to your wallet. If you have not sent funds and are no longer interested in buying then PLEASE CANCEL the trade. This is good etiquete on iBitGo and allows the seller to help others.
payment.domestic-wire-transfer.desc: Use a mobile digital wallet to do an online bank transfer (Payme, AlipayHK, TNG, etc.)
payment.nintendo-eshop-digital-card-gift: Nintendo eShop Digital Card / Gift card
captcha.error: Captcha错误，请重新加载页面后再试

login.tips: IMPORTANT! Please check that you are visiting
login.register.label: New on iBitGo?
login.err.blank: This field may not be blank.

register.phone.label: Phone number

register.pass.tips: At least 6 characters long with one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one special character, and one numeral.

register.agree: By continuing you agree to iBitGo's Terms of Service, Affiliate Program Terms of Service, and Privacy Notice.

home.title:
{act}
Crypto with iBitGo
home.title.desc:
Buy and sell digital currencies using over 350 different payment methods.
Get your iBitGo account to start accepting payments and sending money with 6 million people just like you.
home.title.toppayments: Buy crypto with top payment methods in {country}
home.payments: Over 350 ways to buy and sell Bitcoin
home.payments.desc: Select a payment method you like and trade directly with other people just like you!
home.payment1.desc: Receive payment for your Bitcoin directly into your bank account anywhere in the world.
home.payment2.desc: Get paid in cash at your doorstep or at a convenient pickup location near you.
home.payment3.desc: Send to over 140 online wallets worldwide.
home.payment4.desc: Sell your Bitcoin for big discounts on popular gift cards from iTunes, Amazon and more.
home.payment5.desc: Trade your Bitcoin for any of the popular digital currencies available out there.
home.payment6.desc: Use your Bitcoin to buy virtually anything under the sun.
home.media.desc: iBitGo is very popular in the cryptocurrency space and has had extensive coverage in many famous magazines. One of our missions is to build 100 schools in Africa. Check out the video below to learn more about our #builtwithbitcoin initiative.
home.vendor: Become a Bitcoin vendor on iBitGo
home.vendor.desc: Become a vendor on iBitGo and empower millions around the world with financial freedom. Offer multiple payment methods that buyers like, eliminate middlemen, and we will help you with all the resources and guidance needed to succeed.
home.testimonials.desc: Millions have already successfully used iBitGo and they have had a lot of nice things to say about us. Here's what our users think about iBitGo, in their own words.
home.with.desc: Elevate your financial freedom to a higher plane with iBitGo.
home.with1.desc: Buy Bitcoin on iBitGo in real time. Trade with other users online using our live chat.
home.with2.desc: Sell your Bitcoin at your chosen rate, and get paid in one of numerous payment methods.
home.with3.desc: Your Bitcoin is held in our secure escrow until the trade is completed successfully.
home.with4.desc: Our user feedback system enables you to identify trusted and experienced peers to trade with.
home.with5.desc: Get a life-time free Bitcoin wallet maintained by BitGo, the leading provider of secure Bitcoin wallets.
home.with6.desc: Take advantage of our Affiliate Program to create a steady income stream.
home.start.desc: Find the best deal for you from thousands of active offers from around the world.
walletcreate.title: Get your free, secure bitcoin wallet
walletcreate.subtitle: A simple and safe way to buy, sell, send, and store your Bitcoin.
walletcreate.desc: is a secure and convenient way to manage your money. Sign up today and find out for yourself why millions of people trust us.
walletcreate.sub1: A Bitcoin wallet you can trust
walletcreate.note11: Over 3 million people have used the iBitGo wallet to send and receive over 40,000 BTC. Its best-in-class security features make it one of the most trusted wallets in the world — so you’ll never have to choose between security and convenience.
walletcreate.note12: The iBitGo wallet is functional, safe, and easy to use on all your devices. You can easily manage your funds and top up directly via our peer-to-peer marketplace, and send or receive Bitcoin, in just a few clicks.
walletcreate.note2: Still unsure? We get it. Here are some reasons why you should get the iBitGo Wallet.
walletcreate.note3: At iBitGo, we take the safety of your money seriously. Our strict verification and password requirements make sure that you’re the only person with access to your money.
walletcreate.note4: Enjoy the freedom of over 300 ways to buy or sell your Bitcoin. Our peer-to-peer marketplace connects you safely and privately with real people just like you.
walletcreate.note5: Access your money securely anywhere, anytime. Thanks to the power of the cloud, you won’t lose your money even if you lose your device.
becomevendor.heading: Become a Bitcoin vendor on iBitGo
becomevendor.title: Generate income by selling your Bitcoin on iBitGo using our 350+ payment methods
becomevendor.desc: With iBitGo, kickstart your very own business in a matter of minutes. Create offers with your Bitcoin, set profit margins, and build out a unique customer experience to increase your profits. Sign up as a vendor today and create your first offer.*
becomevendor.feature: The right set of features to manage your trades, offers, and stats
becomevendor.vendors: Trusted by over 12,000 registered Bitcoin vendors
becomevendor.support: High-end support for a seamless trading experience
becomevendor.sub1: Bring your Bitcoin to iBitGo and sell for a profit
becomevendor.desc1:
350+ payment methods
Transaction fees 0-2%
VIP support for high-volume vendors
Overview of transactions and earnings
Affiliate program to onboard new vendors and expand your business
becomevendor.sub2: Trade on iBitGo and start your very own fintech business
becomevendor.desc3: You can browse or create offers for both buying and selling Bitcoin. Set your own rates, find a trade partner, and make your first transaction today.
becomevendor.desc4: Find buyers by completing verification, adding a profile image, and gathering healthy feedback. Having a long healthy trade history increases your reputation and helps you gain the trust of potential customers.
becomevendor.desc5: Buy low, sell high. This is the foundation of a great business model and we agree. Learn more about the nuances of trading on iBitGo, from our help center.
becomevendor.desc6: Don't worry about missing out on potential trades, or messages from customers. iBitGo is easy-to-use and works on all your devices. Our iOS and Android apps, will ensure you are always in the loop and ready for action.
becomevendor.alt6: 显示移动设备上iBitGo App的图片，附带iOS和Android的下载链接。
becomevendor.sub7: Earn more with the iBitGo Affiliate Program
becomevendor.desc7:
iBitGo's Affiliate Program was created to help you increase your profits by inviting your friends, family, and extended network to our platform.
Instant Profits on Every Trade:
becomevendor.desc71:
50% of your Tier 1 affiliates fees
10% of your Tier 2 affiliates fees paid by their affiliates
createoffer.title: Create an Offer
createoffer.signup.title: About This Step
createoffer.signup.desc: Start creating your offer by selecting the cryptocurrency you want to trade, whether or not you want to buy or sell, and the payment method you want to use.
createoffer.signup.hint: To proceed, please create an account
createoffer.type: What would you like to do?
createoffer.sell.desc: Your offer will be listed on the Buy {coin} page.
createoffer.buy.desc: Your offer will be listed on the Sell {coin} page.
createoffer.suggest.desc: Don’t see the payment method of your choice?
createoffer.limit.desc: If the minimum you set in your currency drops below 10 USD in value, we’ll prompt the buyers to pick an amount worth at least 10 USD to proceed with the trade.
createoffer.margin.desc:
Current Bitcoin market price: 346,630.53 CNY
So for every 64 CNY worth of Bitcoin you sell (your minimum trade limit), you will receive 67.2 CNY in return.
createoffer.time.desc: This is how much time your trade partner has to make the payment and click Paid before the trade is automatically canceled.
createoffer.tags.placeholder: Select an offer tag or start typing to search for one
createoffer.tags.desc: Select up to 3 tags that best describe your offer terms.
createoffer.tags.cash-in-person.desc: For trades conducted in cash with a person.
createoffer.tags.e-codes-accepted.desc: Electronic codes are accepted for this trade.
createoffer.tags.e-gift-cards.desc: Not a physical gift card. To be used for online purchases or redeemed via mobile with accepting vendors.
createoffer.tags.external-payment.desc: You may be navigated to an external website such as a payment gateway.
createoffer.tags.friends-and-family.desc: Payment will be made by friends and family paypal payment
createoffer.tags.no-negotiation.desc: Negotiation on price or payment methods violates the iBitGo terms of service.
createoffer.tags.no-receipt-needed.desc: Receipt not required for this trade.
createoffer.tags.no-third-parties.desc: Payments must be made from your own account.
You don’t need to be a verified user to complete this trade.
createoffer.tags.online-payments.desc: Online payments accepted for this trade.
createoffer.tags.receipt-required.desc: You must provide transaction receipt to complete the trade.
createoffer.tags.same-bank-only.desc: Limit trades with users with an account in the same bank as yours.
createoffer.tags.with-receipt.desc: Gift cards have receipt for a trade
createoffer.label: Offer Terms
createoffer.label.placeholder: Maximum 25 characters. Only letters, numbers and dashes.
createoffer.label.desc: Make your offer stand out to other users with a catchy label. Your offer label can be up to 25 characters long and can contain letters, numbers, the apostrophe and the hyphen.
createoffer.terms.desc: Anybody who views your offer will see these terms. Keep them simple and clear to make your offer sound attractive.
createoffer.instruction.placeholder: List out your instructions for your trade partner.
createoffer.instruction.desc: To ensure a succesful trade be transparent about what you expect from your trade partner and list out what you need.
createoffer.requireverified: Require your trade partner to have verified their ID
createoffer.requirename: Require your trade partner to show their full name
createoffer.requirename.desc: When you require your trade partner to display their full name, your name settings will be modified automatically so that your trade partner can view your full name as well.
createoffer.targetcountry.desc: Select a specific country you would like to target and additional traffic will come from this market.
createoffer.memo.desc: You can enter the reason for the Bank Transfer here. It will be sent to your trade partner alongside your Bank Account details. If possible, your trade partner will enter the reason you provide when making the transfer.
createoffer.trusted: Show this offer only to my list of trusted users
createoffer.mintrades.desc: Show my offer only to users who have completed at least:
createoffer.newuser.desc: New users can only trade up to:
createoffer.limitcountries.desc: Select the country you’d like to show this offer in.
createoffer.limitcountries.option2.desc: This offer will NOT be visible for visitors from these countries.
createoffer.limitcountries.option3.desc: This offer will be visible ONLY for visitors from these countries.
createoffer.limitcountries.placeholder: Click to select country or type manually
createoffer.limitcountries.algorithm: Use more precise country detection algorithm (based on more than just user IP)
createoffer.workingtime.desc: Choose the days of the week and times during each day when you want this offer to be active.
createoffer.about.desc: Set the terms, instructions, and limitations for people to trade on this offer.
createoffer.about.payment: And get paid via Western Union in Yuan (Chinese) Renminbi (CNY)
createoffer.about.fee: You will pay iBitGo a 1% fee for each trade
createoffer.about.limit: People can trade between 64 CNY and 1000 CNY
createoffer.about.trustedonly: Only trusted users can begin a trade with you.
createoffer.about.verifiedonly: You require trade partner to have verified their ID

mall.sell.title: Sell {coinname} ({coin})

mall.loading: Please wait while we find the best offers for you.

mall.sort.speed.desc: Avg. Trade Speed: Slowest to Fastest
mall.affiliate.desc: Bring people to iBitGo and earn commission every time they buy crypto.
mall.offline.desc: The following traders were last seen a while ago and may not be very responsive. Choose traders who were online more recently.
how.title: How to {type} {coinname}
profile.check1: Play notification sound for new messages and trades
profile.check2: Receive important emails from us occasionally
profile.check3: Receive SMS notication for onfirmed cryptocurrency deposits
profile.check4: Receive SMS notification for incoming trades
profile.timeintervaldis: How often would you like be notified of new chat messages? Enter 0 to be notified of every new messages.
profile.photo.discript: Upload a nice picture, preferably of yourself. If you upload any explicit or otherwise inappropriate image, we'll remove it immediately.
profile.bio.title: Bio
profile.preferred.discript: Select which currency your wallet will use
profile.info.title: Info
profile.actives.title: Active Offers
profile.feedback.title: Feedback
userconnected.nosearch: You haven't connected any app or website.
userconnected.title: Connected Apps & Websites
userconnected.content: Below you can find the complete list of apps and websites you've used ibitgo to sign in with. These apps and websites will automatically have access to parts of your information. In case you remove any of these, they will still have access to the information you shared with them previously, yet they can't collect anything new

trade.seller.title: 您将要出售{quantity}{coin}，换取 {amount}{currency}，支付方式为{payment}
trade.seller.paid.desc: 在释放泰达币之前，请务必先检查您的Payoneer余额，确认已收到资金。一旦释放加密货币，交易不可逆转。
trade.seller.desc: 请警惕不良用户要求您提前释放加密货币，或使用虚假的支付截图，在释放加密货币之前，请先确保您已收到资金。
trade.dispute.title: 争议
trade.dispute.desc: 如果您遇到无法解决的问题，请发起争议，我们的调解人会为您提供协助。
trade.info.desc: 已为此交易保留{quantity}{coin}，其中包括iBitGo的费用{fee}{coin}。
